name: Mini Kyodai Robo Goemon Compact
storyline: The giant robot Goemon Impact and a new character in the SD style, Goemon Compact, take on a training fighting simulation to save the world from evildoers. The game takes place all over Japan, where the heroes can gain experience points and travel to many stores in order to acquire more powerful weapons.
summary: Mini Kyodai Robo Goemon Compact is a role-playing game for mobile phones, part of the Ganbare Goemon series. It was published by Konami and released in May 7, 2003 exclusively in Japan.
